question:
Which among the statements is/are correct about Lake Malawi?
  1. It is bordered by Rwanda, Tanzania and Malawi
  2. It has more species of fish than any other lake in the world
Select the correct code from the options given below:
explanation:
Lake Malawi has more species of fish than any other lake in the world. It is bordered by following countries:
Malawi
Mozambique
Tanzania
